meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Joe Indiviglia Ellen Plitt Buzzy Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7288.

td.p: Joe Indiviglia, a real estate marketer from San Diego, California
Ellen Plitt, an emergency room nurse from St. Louis, Missouri
Buzzy Cohen, a music executive from Los Angeles, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $50,002)

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'House of Cards

Buzzy
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):
Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: (Alex: We'll give you the island, and you tell us which country it belongs to.)

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_1_1', 'clue_DJ_1_1_stuck', '[Alex reads the blank as "this place".]

Egypt

Buzzy
')

"When thou goest to return into ____, see that thou do all those wonders before Pharaoh"')

"When thou goest to return into ____, see that thou do all those wonders before Pharaoh"

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Joe] The nonstop solo flight from America to France.)
...
(Alex: [To Buzzy] Picked the wrong correct response.)
JoeWho is Lindbergh?
$3,995
EllenWho is
$4,201
BuzzyWho is Scott?
$5,401
Lindbergh')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"A stimulus to the courageous", the $25,000 Orteig Prize offer of 1919 resulted in his success 8 years later')

tr.td: "A stimulus to the courageous", the $25,000 Orteig Prize offer of 1919 resulted in his success 8 years later
